block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 21 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. The Simple Dart by John Smith. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 020 : Ready For Takeoff by Didier Boursin ", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/gvoPPkv6roo Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel Thanks for watching.
